sentences.english: They are quite worn out. Marmee must have a new pair.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子太破舊了，媽咪得換雙新的。

sentences.english: Frances is the spitting image of her beautiful mother.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭西斯真是她漂亮媽咪的翻版哪。

sentences.english: The design for this little decoration is Mummy's own creation.
sentences.chinese: 這個吊飾造型是媽咪自己想的。

sentences.english: Daddy it's me, HELP mummy her wrists are bleeding!
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是我，快救救媽咪，她的手脕流著血。

sentences.english: Last time Justin successfully tried out " Story Solitaire" with Mummy.
sentences.chinese: 上回大貝貝和媽咪在車上試玩故事接龍成功。

sentences.english: Last night Mummy got up at midnight to do some work.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚媽咪三更半夜起來工作。

sentences.english: If Mommy is in a hurry and wants to carry me, I must walk alone.
sentences.chinese: 如果媽咪很急而想要抱我走，我一定要自己走。

sentences.english: Mummy actually thinks that Justin is learning really well.
sentences.chinese: 明明媽咪覺得大貝貝學得很好呀。

sentences.english: "But Mommy, i am sat by daddy. " little Johnny replys.
sentences.chinese: “但是，媽咪，我坐在爸爸的旁邊”小強尼回答。

sentences.english: Living with a mother who lied to me for 15 years scares me.
sentences.chinese: 同一個額左我15年嘅媽咪住令我好驚。

sentences.english: If possible, help the mother into the back of the car.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的話，幫助媽咪挪到汽車的後面。

sentences.english: Look here, what Mommy got from 99 Ranch Market.
sentences.chinese: 看啊，媽咪從大華99買什麼好東東了？

sentences.english: Mammy, it's so scary in the dark.
Pico: What an annoying dog! Mummy, let's go home okay?
sentences.chinese: 好煩的狗，媽咪不如我們回家好嗎？

definition: to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
